elements.text: You are going to see your family for a holiday. You enjoy seeing your family, but recently it has been getting more difficult to get out to see them. As you imagine the amount of time you will spend with your loved ones over the next few years, you believe your family will drift...

elements.name: Spending Time With Family_Family & Home Life_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
